sentences.en: An increase in crime could kill the golden goose of tourism.
sentences.cn: 犯罪率的上升可能会扼杀旅游业这只产金蛋的鹅。

sentences.en: Goose fat gives the most unctuous flavour but you can use chicken fat.
sentences.cn: 鹅油最肥美，不过你也可以用鸡油。

sentences.en: Harry wondered if Potts had deliberately sent him on a wild goose chase.
sentences.cn: 哈里疑心波茨故意让他白费力气地瞎找一通。

sentences.en: He got a goose egg on his maths test.
He is not an ass [ a goose ] as they make him.
sentences.cn: 他不象大家猜想的那样笨.

sentences.en: It gave me goose pimples just to think about it.
sentences.cn: 只是想到它我就起鸡皮疙瘩。

sentences.en: Jane did such a thing, she is really as silly as a goose.
sentences.cn: 简竟然干出这种事, 她实在是太蠢了.

sentences.en: Sauce for the goose is sauce for the gander.
She still got goose bumps whenever he walked into the room.
sentences.cn: 只要他一走进房间，她仍旧会起鸡皮疙瘩。

sentences.en: The friar preached against stealing and had a goose in his sleeve.

sentences.cn: 那只鹅扇着沉重的翅膀飞走了.

sentences.en: The goose saw her and cackled loudly.
sentences.cn: 那只鹅看到她,大声地嘎嘎叫.

sentences.en: The Wild Goose Pagoda was dimly visible.
You don't kill the goose that lays the golden egg.

phrases.tran_cn: 徒劳的搜索；劳而无功的事

trans.tran_en: the cooked meat of this bird

trans.tran_cn: 拧或掐屁股，忽然加满油； 催促
